00067     class Exception : public std::exception
00068     {
00069     public:

00081 
00086     #define TICPPTHROW( message )                                           \
00087     {                                                                       \
00088         std::ostringstream full_message;                                    \
00089         std::string file( __FILE__ );                                       \
00090         file = file.substr( file.find_last_of( "\\/" ) + 1 );               \
00091         full_message << message << " <" << file << "@" << __LINE__ << ">";  \
00092         throw Exception( full_message.str() );                              \
00093     }
00094 
00096     class Base
00097     {
00098     public:
00099 
00105         template < class T >
00106             std::string ToString( const T& value )
00107         {
00108             std::stringstream convert;
00109             convert << value;
00110             if ( convert.fail() )
00111             {
00112                 TICPPTHROW( "Could not convert value to text" );
00113             }
00114             return convert.str();
00115         }
00116 
00117         std::string ToString( const std::string& value )
00118         {
00119             return value;
00120         }
00121 
00128         template < class T >
00129             void FromString( const std::string& temp, T* out )
00130         {
00131             std::istringstream val( temp );
00132             val >> *out;
00133 
00134             if ( val.fail() )
00135             {
00136                 TICPPTHROW( "Could not convert \"" << temp << "\" to target type" );
00137             }
00138         }
00139 
00143         void FromString( const std::string& temp, std::string* out )
00144         {
00145             *out = temp;
00146         }
00147 
00152         int Row()
00153         {
00154             return GetBasePointer()->Row();
00155         }
00156 
00161         int Column()
00162         {
00163             return GetBasePointer()->Column();
00164         }
00165 
00169         virtual ~Base()
00170         {
00171             DeleteSpawnedWrappers();
00172         }
00173 
00174     protected:
00175         TiCppRCImp* m_impRC;    
00177         mutable std::vector< Base* > m_spawnedWrappers; 
00185         void SetImpRC( TiXmlBase* node )
00186         {
00187             m_impRC = node->m_tiRC;
00188         }
00189 
00190         void ValidatePointer() const
00191         {
00192             if ( m_impRC->IsNull() )
00193             {
00194                 TICPPTHROW( "Internal TiXml Pointer is NULL" );
00195             }
00196         }
00197 
00202         void DeleteSpawnedWrappers()
00203         {
00204             std::vector< Base* >::reverse_iterator wrapper;
00205             for ( wrapper = m_spawnedWrappers.rbegin(); wrapper != m_spawnedWrappers.rend(); ++wrapper )
00206             {
00207                 delete *wrapper;
00208             }
00209             m_spawnedWrappers.clear();
00210         }
00211 
00216         virtual TiXmlBase* GetBasePointer() = 0;
00217     };

00675 
00683         template < class T >
00684             void IterateFirst( const std::string& value, T** first )
00685         {
00686             *first = 0;
00687             for( Node* child = FirstChild( value, false ); child; child = child->NextSibling( value, false ) )
00688             {
00689                 *first = dynamic_cast< T* >( child );
00690                 if ( 0 != *first )
00691                 {
00692                     return;
00693                 }
00694             }
00695         }
00696 
00697         virtual void IterateFirst( const std::string&, Attribute** )
00698         {
00699             TICPPTHROW( "Attributes can only be iterated with Elements." )
00700         }
00701 
00709         template < class T >
00710             void IterateNext( const std::string& value, T** next )
00711         {
00712             Node* sibling = NextSibling( value, false );
00713             *next = dynamic_cast< T* >( sibling );
00714 
00715             while ( ( 0 != sibling ) && ( 0 == *next ) )
00716             {
00717                 sibling = sibling->NextSibling( value, false );
00718                 *next = dynamic_cast< T* >( sibling );
00719             }
00720         }
00721 
00729         template < class T >
00730             void IteratePrevious( const std::string& value, T** previous  )
00731         {
00732             Node* sibling = PreviousSibling( value, false );
00733             *previous = dynamic_cast< T* >( sibling );
00734 
00735             while ( ( 0 != sibling ) && ( 0 == *previous ) )
00736             {
00737                 sibling = sibling->PreviousSibling( value, false );
00738                 *previous = dynamic_cast< T* >( sibling );
00739             }
00740         }
00741 
00750         Element* NextSiblingElement( bool throwIfNoSiblings = true );

00827         bool NoChildren();
00828 
00835         template < class T >
00836             T* To()
00837         {
00838             T* pointer = dynamic_cast< T* >( this );
00839             if ( 0 == pointer )
00840             {
00841                 std::string thisType = typeid( this ).name();
00842                 std::string targetType = typeid( T ).name();
00843                 std::string thatType = typeid( *this ).name();
00844                 TICPPTHROW( "The " << thisType.substr( 6 ) << " could not be casted to a " << targetType.substr( 6 )
00845                     << " *, because the target object is not a " << targetType.substr( 6 ) << ". (It is a " << thatType.substr( 6 ) << ")" );
00846             }
00847             return pointer;
00848         }
00849 
00855         Document* ToDocument();

00884 
00890         StylesheetReference* ToStylesheetReference();
00891 
00909         std::auto_ptr< Node > Clone() const;
00910 
00914         friend std::istream& operator >>( std::istream& in, Node& base )
00915         {
00916             in >> *base.GetTiXmlPointer();
00917             return in;
00918         }
00919 
00923         friend std::ostream& operator <<( std::ostream& out, Node& base )
00924         {
00925             out << *base.GetTiXmlPointer();
00926             return out;
00927         }
00928

00975     template < class T = Node >
00976         class Iterator
00977     {
00978     private:
00979         T* m_p;                 
00980         std::string m_value;    
00982     public:
00983 
00993         T* begin( Node* parent )
00994         {
00995             T* pointer;
00996             parent->IterateFirst( m_value, &pointer );
00997             return pointer;
00998         }
00999 
01008         T* end()
01009         {
01010             return 0;
01011         }
01012 
01021         Iterator( const std::string& value = "" )
01022             : m_p( 0 ), m_value( value )
01023         {
01024         }
01025 
01027         Iterator( T* node, const std::string& value = "" )
01028             : m_p( node ), m_value( value )
01029         {
01030         }
01031 
01033         Iterator( const Iterator& it, const std::string& value  = "" )
01034             : m_p( it.m_p ), m_value( value )
01035         {
01036         }
01037 
01042         T* Get()
01043         {
01044             return m_p;
01045         }
01046 
01048         Iterator& operator=( const Iterator& it )
01049         {
01050             m_p = it.m_p;
01051             return *this;
01052         }
01053 
01055         Iterator& operator=( T* p )
01056         {
01057             m_p = p;
01058             return *this;
01059         }
01060 
01062         Iterator& operator++()
01063         {
01064             m_p->IterateNext( m_value, &m_p );
01065             return *this;
01066         }
01067 
01069         Iterator& operator++(int)
01070         {
01071             return this->operator ++();
01072         }
01073 
01075         Iterator& operator--()
01076         {
01077             m_p->IteratePrevious( m_value, &m_p );
01078             return *this;
01079         }
01080 
01082         Iterator& operator--(int)
01083         {
01084             return this->operator --();
01085         }
01086 
01088         bool operator!=( T* p )
01089         {
01090             return m_p != p;
01091         }
01092 
01094         bool operator!=( const Iterator& it )
01095         {
01096             return m_p != it.m_p;
01097         }
01098 
01100         bool operator==( T* p )
01101         {
01102             return m_p == p;
01103         }
01104 
01106         bool operator==( const Iterator& it )
01107         {
01108             return m_p == it.m_p;
01109         }
01110 
01112         T* operator->()
01113         {
01114             return m_p;
01115         }
01116 
01118         T& operator*()
01119         {
01120             return *m_p;
01121         }
01122     };
01123 
01125     template < class T >
01126         class NodeImp : public Node
01127     {
01128     protected:
01129 
01130         T* m_tiXmlPointer;      
01138         TiXmlNode* GetTiXmlPointer() const
01139         {
01140             ValidatePointer();
01141             return m_tiXmlPointer;
01142         }
01143 
01151         void SetTiXmlPointer( T* newPointer )
01152         {
01153             m_tiXmlPointer = newPointer;
01154             SetImpRC( newPointer );
01155         }
01156 
01161         NodeImp( T* tiXmlPointer )
01162         {
01163             // Check for NULL pointers
01164             if ( 0 == tiXmlPointer )
01165             {
01166                 TICPPTHROW( "Can not create a " << typeid( T ).name() );
01167             }
01168             SetTiXmlPointer( tiXmlPointer );
01169             m_impRC->IncRef();
01170         }
01171 
01177         virtual void operator=( const NodeImp<T>& copy )
01178         {
01179             DeleteSpawnedWrappers();
01180 
01181             // Dropping the reference to the old object
01182             this->m_impRC->DecRef();
01183 
01184             // Pointing to the new Object
01185             SetTiXmlPointer( copy.m_tiXmlPointer );
01186 
01187             // The internal tixml pointer changed in the above line
01188             this->m_impRC->IncRef();
01189         }
01190 
01196         NodeImp( const NodeImp<T>& copy ) : Node( copy )
01197         {
01198             // Pointing to the new Object
01199             SetTiXmlPointer( copy.m_tiXmlPointer );
01200 
01201             // The internal tixml pointer changed in the above line
01202             this->m_impRC->IncRef();
01203         }
01204 
01205     public:
01206 
01207         /*
01208         Deletes the spawned wrapper objects.
01209         Decrements reference count.
01210         */
01211         virtual ~NodeImp()
01212         {
01213             // The spawnedWrappers need to be deleted before m_tiXmlPointer
01214             DeleteSpawnedWrappers();
01215             m_impRC->DecRef();
01216         }
01217     };
01218

01425         void IterateFirst( const std::string&, Attribute** first )
01426         {
01427             *first = 0;
01428             for( Attribute* child = FirstAttribute( false ); child; child = child->Next( false ) )
01429             {
01430                 *first = dynamic_cast< Attribute* >( child );
01431                 if ( 0 != *first )
01432                 {
01433                     return;

01445         template < class T >

01447         {
01448             ValidatePointer();
01449             m_tiXmlPointer->SetAttribute( name, ToString( value ) );
01450         }
01451 
01464         std::string GetText( bool throwIfNotFound = true )
01465         {
01466             // Get the element's text value as a std::string
01467             std::string temp;
01468             if ( !GetTextImp( &temp ) )
01469             {
01470                 if ( throwIfNotFound )
01471                 {
01472                     TICPPTHROW( "Text does not exists in the current element" );
01473                 }
01474             }
01475 
01476             return temp;
01477         }
01478 
01490         std::string GetTextOrDefault( const std::string& defaultValue )
01491         {
01492             // Get the element's text value as a std::string
01493             std::string temp;
01494             if ( !GetTextImp( &temp ) )
01495             {
01496                 return defaultValue;
01497             }
01498 
01499             return temp;
01500         }
01501 
01516         template < class T, class DefaultT >
01517             void GetTextOrDefault( T* value, const DefaultT& defaultValue )
01518         {
01519             // Get the element's text value as a std::string
01520             std::string temp;
01521             if ( !GetTextImp( &temp ) )
01522             {
01523                 // The text value does not exist - set value to the default
01524                 *value = defaultValue;
01525                 return;
01526             }
01527 
01528             // Stream the value from the string to T
01529             FromString( temp, value );
01530         }
01531 
01547         template< class T >
01548             void GetText( T* value, bool throwIfNotFound = true )
01549         {
01550             // Get the element's text value as a std::string
01551             std::string temp;
01552             if ( !GetTextImp( &temp ) )
01553             {
01554                 if ( throwIfNotFound )
01555                 {
01556                     TICPPTHROW( "Text does not exists in the current element" );
01557                 }
01558                 else
01559                 {
01560                     return;
01561                 }
01562             }
01563 
01564             // Stream the value from the string to T
01565             FromString( temp, value );
01566         }
01567 
01575         template < class T >
01576             void SetText( const T& value )
01577         {
01578             ValidatePointer();
01579             std::string temp = ToString( value );
01580 
01581             if ( m_tiXmlPointer->NoChildren() )
01582             {
01583                 m_tiXmlPointer->LinkEndChild( new TiXmlText( temp ) );
01584             }
01585             else
01586             {
01587                 if ( 0 == m_tiXmlPointer->GetText() )
01588                 {
01589                     m_tiXmlPointer->InsertBeforeChild( m_tiXmlPointer->FirstChild(), TiXmlText( temp ) );
01590                 }
01591                 else
01592                 {
01593                     // There already is text, so change it
01594                     m_tiXmlPointer->FirstChild()->SetValue( temp );
01595                 }
01596             }
01597         }
01598 
01610         template < class T, class DefaulT >
01611             void GetAttributeOrDefault( const std::string& name, T* value, const DefaulT& defaultValue )
01612         {
01613             // Get the attribute's value as a std::string
01614             std::string temp;
01615             if ( !GetAttributeImp( name, &temp ) )
01616             {
01617                 // The attribute does not exist - set value to the default
01618                 *value = defaultValue;
01619                 return;
01620             }
01621 
01622             // Stream the value from the string to T
01623             FromString( temp, value );
01624         }
01625 
01634         std::string GetAttributeOrDefault( const std::string& name, const std::string& defaultValue );
01635 
01647         template< class T >
01648             void GetAttribute( const std::string& name, T* value, bool throwIfNotFound = true )
01649         {
01650             // Get the attribute's value as a std::string
01651             std::string temp;
01652             if ( !GetAttributeImp( name, &temp ) )
01653             {
01654                 if ( throwIfNotFound )
01655                 {
01656                     TICPPTHROW( "Attribute does not exist" );
01657                 }
01658                 else
01659                 {
01660                     return;
01661                 }
01662             }
01663 
01664             // Stream the value from the string to T
01665             FromString( temp, value );
01666         }
